descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

operation.name: operation

options.name: Compress
options.description: Compress files into a zip or gzip archive

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input binary field(s) containing the file(s) to decompress
binaryPropertyName.description: To process more than one file, use a comma-separated list of the binary fields names
binaryPropertyName.ai_hint: To process more than one file, use a comma-separated list of the binary fields names

outputFormat.name: outputFormat
outputFormat.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

binaryPropertyOutput.name: binaryPropertyOutput
binaryPropertyOutput.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

outputPrefix.name: outputPrefix
outputPrefix.description: Prefix to add to the decompressed files
outputPrefix.ai_hint: Prefix to add to the decompressed files

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'compress' AND @version == 1 THEN SHOW parameter 'outputFormat'
IF operation == 'compress' AND outputFormat == 'zip' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF outputFormat == 'zip' AND operation == 'compress' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyOutput'
IF operation == 'compress' AND outputFormat == 'gzip' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF outputFormat == 'gzip' AND operation == 'compress' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyOutput'
IF operation == 'compress' AND outputFormat == 'gzip' AND @version == 1 THEN SHOW parameter 'outputPrefix'
